So fast, cheap and environmentally friendly! A pretty decent combo. But we need help to succeed. That is why we have decided that everyone who likes and travels with us should also become part-owner of the business. The more we become, the greater the chances that this will go the way! We have a very smart IT system, which distributes runs and calculates where our pods should be in order to be close to the customers. It's good for you of course (you never have to wait long for a pod). But it is good for our economy too (we will have more runs in less time). We have signed a collective agreement, which guarantees decent wages and gives drivers the opportunity to influence their own working hours We believe that Bzzt will make a real difference. For the environment, for the air we breathe and for the city we live in.

We Empower Your People. They Grow Your Business. Helping leaders create healthier work communities where people thrive. Our health and our environment are at a tipping point. While chronic disease is on the rise and dramatically affecting people’s quality of life, our food choices continue to be a major driver of global climate change. But there is a way to solve our health and climate challenges. We need to change the way millions of people eat and we need to do it fast. This can happen by educating, engaging and empowering people to make healthier, more conscious food choices. We decided to start in the workplace, where hundreds of millions of people spend nearly one third of their time. HOLISTAL provides digital tools to leaders so they can protect the health of their employees. We believe that when employees feel safe and supported, they will put their blood, sweat and tears into realising their leader’s vision.By inspiring business leaders to protect the health of those who work for them, we can empower their employees with the confidence to take control of their own health. Our digital platform helps individuals eat healthier, get adequate rest, take a mental break and be physically active. HOLISTAL is consisting of a mobile application for employees and a web dashboard for monitoring performance. On demand health & wellness lectures covering various topics that are of interest to your organisation; from stress to nutrition to sleep. A long term wellness strategy is an important tool for employee health, performance & retention. Several studies suggest that individuals that take care of themselves are more engaged at work.
Industries: Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software, SaaS

About: 3D Mobile Body Scanning Solution. We believe in a future where everything should be personalized after our unique conditions and bodies. Our mission is to be the enabler for more sustainable consumption, production and distribution and have a positive impact on people and the planet. The Fit provide data driven size- & fit recommendations in e-commerce. With a mobile body scanning solution for extracting body data from images and an intelligent recommendation engine The Fit bring insight to retailers and personalized user experiences to online shoppers The Fit changes the online experience of the future by powering personal, relevant experiences for millions of shoppers. Bringing transparency to consumers and data driven insights to businesses, we create a new era of e-commerce.

Vital info when seconds matter. twICEme provides a fast, reliable, and user-friendly tool for access to personal vital information. twICEme is integrated into protective equipment so that first responders can help you and your loved ones in case of an emergency. Your lost child in the ski slopes or your unconsciousness during a bicycle accident are both emergencies. In order for first responders to be of help, specific information is required. With twICEme, vital information is collected and accessible in seconds, integrated into your equipment. Our mission is to become a global standard for vital information to ultimately save lives. Together, we unite around the vision of offering a solution that will eventually save lives and create a safer world for people exposed to risk.

Say goodbye to buying kidswear, baby steps to make fashion circular. The consumption and production of clothes is one of the main contributors to the environmental pollution, second only to the petroleum industry. In addition, the excessive use of water in the production, requiring around 2,700 liters to produce just one T-shirt, contributes to the global water stress. Urbankiddo is dedicated to stop waste and prolong the lifecycle of garments, through the power of circularity. In our approach to clothing circulation, the clothes you share to the app are made available for any member to request. After a member picks them up, they never go back to you, but instead they move, “circulate”, from one member to another in periods of time as each member’s kid outgrows them. At Urbankiddo, we believe in the power of circulation.

The storage solution of the future! We at Budkeep find it unnecessarily expensive to rent storage space, while all new storage facilities being built have an unjustified negative impact on the environment. We change this by offering a platform that allows people and companies to make money in their spaces that they may not even use.Therefore, Budkeep was founded to enable a simple and smooth new source of revenue for existing spaces. We are a service based on sharing economy - a platform that helps people share resources with each other. Our Hosts get a new flexible way to make money. At the same time, our guests can find storage solutions wherever they want, for up to 50% lower than the market price. Urban spaces are used more efficiently and the impact of the storage market on the environment is radically reduced. A win-win-win, in other words.

Together we build a brighter and smarter energy future! We bring advanced data science, new innovative business models and a whole new digital infrastructure in the hands of energy utilities. There’s a lot of talk and research about how the energy system will and have to change through digital transformation, smart grids and decentralized energy systems. We are building the cloud platform that will enable energy companies to meet this future in practice. Our platform is built for disrupting how utilities and the energy systems are traditionally managed and operated. Our solutions combine industrial expertise with modern IT-infrastructure and data analysis, creating user-friendly but powerful tools which enable increased resource utilisation, improved customer relations and reduced environmental footprint. We are passionate about using the latest technology within digital and energy systems to tailor solutions that empower the sustainable energy systems of tomorrow.

A digital medical service for patients and healthcare providers. A new generation of medical diagnostics. Achieved with the power of artificial intelligence. Neo Health is our vision at BYON8. A vision of a next-gen healthcare ecosystem. An ecosystem where several digital and hardware solutions interact with each other to create a more equal healthcare environment. Our first step to achieve that vision is through an artificial intelligence: Aitopya the Personal A.I Doctor. Even when you are well and not seeking care, you can easily fill in information and answer questions regarding your health status via the AITOPYA application. This can be done anywhere on any hardware device. Unique questions are dynamically generated through the power of artificial intelligence, making them very similar to a physician's questions. The medical data is then analyzed by AITOPYA and transferred to healthcare personnel with intelligent recommendations regarding the level of care, e.g. emergency care or primary care. If the level of care requires a consultation, patient data is then further transferred to an available healthcare professional. It contributes to a higher quality of healthcare, for everyone, no matter where you are from, who you are or where you live. Healthcare is about equality. You're not only helping yourself when using AITOPYA; you're helping everyone in need of healthcare. The concept is simple. When you use AITOPYA as a healthcare service we provide developing countries with the same healthcare service in return, at a very low cost.
Industries: Consumer Goods, Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software, SaaS

About: Optimize your health with Wellow. Wellow is a health service for you as a woman. Starting with a simple blood test, you can make smarter health decisions and gain better control over your health. Many women-related health problems can be easily detected with the help of early checks. The technology can improve life if it involves relevant and scientific answers, access to its test results and a continued direct dialogue between you who is a patient and a healthcare provider. With a holistic approach, we increase the chance of staying healthy. This means access to blood tests based on your specific needs and access to physical, emotional, and lifestyle related care. Not only through medical comments, but also through follow-up meetings with midwives, psychologists, gynecologists and others. Preventive care should be a necessity, not a privilege, andearly health checks are a step to proper care when you need it.
Industries: Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software, Service

About: Doctor visit to your home in Stockholm. Avoid waiting rooms and queues. Get medical care and vaccinations straight to your home instead. The same care and the same price as the health center, but with shorter waiting times. Ally is a newly started healthcare provider in Stockholm who digitizes and simplifies the visit by offering home visits by doctors and nurses booked via an app. With home visits, we can combine the quality and security of traditional care with the availability of digital care and contribute to more effective care. Our vision is to create a service that combines convenience and accessibility with quality of care and medical integrity. We strive for a positive impact on Swedish healthcare where we relieve rather than strain. We believe in the long-term perspective and the importance of creating a win-win-win for health care providers, patients and society.

Grow your own vegetables. Turn 1sqm of your home into a 25sqm vegetables garden without using soil. Without the need for soil or the hassle of having to water plants yourself. The Gaia Grow System™ is a self-watering automatic vertical hydroponic kit. Gaia is a soil-less growing unit designed in Sweden to fit any modern home. Gaia Grow System™ will make it possible to organize an indoor farm, adapted to everyones need, big or small, at home in order to grow vegetables, herbs and medicinal plants without using soil. Modern and designed hydroponic growing equipment and technology makes it now possibly to use an indoor hydroponic growing system for people all over the world. Home hydroponics is a new and growing trend amongst urban people as it contribute to a sustainable development of our urban environment and also very fun to watch the lettuce or the tomatoes grow and to teach the kids how a little seed can become a big cucumber. An indoor hydroponic system will revolutionize the food production, how we grow and what we eat and optimise the quality of the greens for every home around the world. Most people around the world who lives in urban environments do not have access to any farming or any land suitable for growing vegetables, like a kitchen garden. So growing vegetables at home is something most people only can dream about.

Better care for all women. Freya is Sweden's first digital health care provider for women. We are experts in women's care and health. This means that we have in-depth knowledge of example endometriosis, menopause and other aspects of women's health, but like a regular health center can also help you with other problems. Freya is a digital service to the physical care center Doctor Come Home which has an agreement with the Stockholm region and where you can also get help with physical visits. Freya is focusing on three main areas : Offer contact with knowledgeable healthcare staff with specific knowledge of women's health, spreading knowledge and raising awareness about women's health and care, develop tools to monitor and analyze individual parameters, thereby creating an increased understanding of the factors that influence health. Sweden is one of the world's most equal countries. Despite this, there are major inequalities, even within healthcare. Women's health and care are neglected. There are many examples of areas within women's care where competence, accessibility and care need to be strengthened. Examples of this are endometriosis care, severe menstrual pain, mental health and birth defects.

Enabling trust and transparency in a data sharing economy. iGrant.io is a cloud-based data operator platform for consented use of personal data, enabling its clients to exchange and monetise their customers’ data assets while complying with regulations. Any organisation, whether public or private, can unlock the value of the wealth of personal data they hold on behalf of individuals who are empowered to take control of how their data is used. By providing a secure and trustworthy means to protect personal data, iGrant.io lowers the risk of privacy breaches, creates trust relationships between companies and their customers, and, in so doing, opens up new business opportunities. We believe that any digital economy thrives on trust and transparency and the key to making it successful is empowering individuals to decide how their personal data is used. Our mission is to make it easy for people to choose with confidence how their data is managed and shared and in so doing provide businesses with greater scope to leverage the data they manage.

Elsa helps you understand how lifestyle habits and treatment affect your rheumatoid arthritis (RA). Our goal is to give patients the power to influence how they feel about themselves, and to drive knowledge about what gives a healthier life and increased well-being. With Elsa you can do research on yourself! By logging your habits, you will better understand which choices can affect your particular illness and your well-being. Your experiences will also be able to help other people with rheumatoid arthritis - and the research at large. By using the app you not only help yourself, but also everyone else living with the same illness. Our goal is to make current research accessible to people with chronic illness in an educational and useful way. Among other things, it is about highlighting facts that explain how different lifestyle habits can improve the treatment effect of your medication.

We are experts in implantable microelectronics technology and related services. We have developed a platform for frictionless health logging and remote diagnostics. We apply small, passive, sensor-equipped injectable subdermal implants that allow users to check their vital parameters at any time in any setting just by swiping the implant with their phone. Our platform can, among other applications, be applied for early detection of fever both on the individual and on the population level. It could be used for monitoring of the spread of an epidemic like the Covid-19 virus as well as other flu epidemics.

Unbiased is building technology which enables to connect people and make their voices heard without compromising privacy and consent. We are aimed at building a complete user privacy focused social platform which enables users to monetize their data and gain incentives. With our search app for big data analytics we aim to provide insights to users and bring value to their opinions. By making the applications we build transparent, simple to use and innovative. We are combining the power of Crowd-Sourcing with next-generation technologies like Blockchain, Machine Learning and AI. Our solutions are superior to the existing alternatives as it brings the best of both worlds. Every user on Unbiased could earn rewards for creating value to the platform and the earned rewards can also be used to take advantage of other services on the platform. By doing so, we believe that we will move forward altogether towards a healthy society where transparency, trust and quality are valued.

Nature as a game Do you want to learn more about animals and nature, get involved in staying more in nature and at the same time contribute to research? Then Biologg is for you! To offer a fun and educational gaming experience in nature and at the same time help to collect data for research and conservation. Biologg is a mobile game that logs observations of species out in the wild. In the game you can collect points, live up to different species groups and make challenges. The data collected will later be used for research and conservation.

Igeia Health Labs is a company dedicated to fight chronic non communicable diseases through primary prevention interventions. Our philosophy is that health promotion and primary preventive disease management is the most sustainable and most efficient way to create healthy communities, businesses and individuals. We help companies, public sectors and non governmental organisations trough the whole process of the primary preventive management cycle - from predictive analysis and strategic planning to action and sustainable implementation. Our methodology is based on evidence-based research from a broad range of relevant disciplines such as psychology, sociology, epidemiology and public health, in addition to economics and medicine which is our core competence

Rektra wants to revolutionize the recruitment industry. We are a digital headhunter - a matching algorithm that enables an accurate selection process via AI, artificial intelligence. An automated and open-minded recruitment tool with the candidate's future vision in focus. We headhunt through AI - Faster, more efficient and open-minded. The focus is on the candidate's terms and wishes for the future, not just their history and CV. In this way, the matching between candidates and employers' offers will be accurate. We are experts in automated selection and only match candidates and employers when there is a mutual interest. The match will be high quality, save time and cost and the candidate will quickly find the right career. Of course, our match is anonymous. We want to change the view on job search and place the candidate's conditions at the center. We believe that we can contribute to a more equitable labor market where recruitment is based on competence and vision for the future, not name, appearance, gender, age or network.

We bring social entrepreneurs together with volunteers who are both striving to make a difference in society. By connecting good people we strive to initiate social change. Volunteering is always a great idea, and we help you do good to feel good. We are the matchmakers of tomorrow. The need for sustainability and social entrepreneurship is bigger than ever. There are lots of social entrepreneurs sitting on great ideas but lacking the resources or competence. At the same time the interest for volunteering is growing, but many employers don’t know how to take the first step to get involved. So how could we connect them and help them reach a common goal? We bring social entrepreneurs together with volunteers who are both striving to make a difference in society.

We are developing, inventing and supporting ground-breaking innovations and technologies by our award-winning team of serial entrepreneurs and professionals. Our primary focus is on products and services in the fields of Healthcare, Life Science, Cleantech, Sustainability and Environment. Our mission is to create positive impact on the world, contribute to equality and increase the life quality on our planet. HeartstringsTM is one of our successful portfolio examples.

Meet Alex, the digital companion that treats unhealthy habits. Alex saves lives by providing digital medicine to people who aren’t sick, yet. Alex is transforming health care by preventing people from getting chronically ill in the first place. 40% of all premature deaths could be prevented by changing behavior. To achieve this we combine state of the art technology with the latest research in the field of psychology and a stellar consumer-first user experience.

Helping restaurants reduce climate impact from food. With the Klimato web-app, calculating the climate impact of the food you serve is easy peasy. Create recipes based on ingredients, production method and country of origin to retrieve the exact CO2e-impact of each dish. We help you offset unavoidable emissions through investments in Gold Standard certified projects. Today’s food system accounts for 25% of the world’s total greenhouse gas emissions. This means we are responsible for emitting 14 000 000 000 tonnes of CO2e every year, just because of what we eat. However, we could actually cut this amount in half by changing our diets and switching to eating more climate friendly food! The numbers are here and they are clear, now is the time to act!

Instant Carpooling - carpool to the office or home with Passenger and make your commute easy, green and valuable. Passenger is an award winning startup that develops innovative transportation solutions that drives the world towards more cost effective and environmentally friendly transportation. We’ve built the world’s first dynamic real-time combined mobility service making it easy, cost effective and environmentally friendly for people to get where they want to go. Passenger is funded by the Swedish Energy Agency and is also funded by the EU through the European Institute of Innovation & Technology fund. Make your commute valuable! With Passenger you earn leaf points for every kilometer you drive or carpool, redeem your points for free carwashes, fuel or your next trip with Passenger. Empty cars are one of the worlds most unused resources. You can easily contribute to the environment with Passenger by carpooling with other people who would've made the same trip as you!
Industries: Energy & Greentech, IT & Software, Maritime & Transport, Service

About: Co-living is a modern and sustainable way of living that benefits both the individual and the wallet. A home that offers both the community of living with others while providing the privacy of their own living. Our ambition is for COLIVE to help solve the housing shortage for young adults and increase social integration through the development of new housing. In this way we want to contribute to the growth of Sweden and big cities to continue to flourish.

Revolutionizing Payments. Centiglobe offers an instant financial multi-currency transaction system with a direct connection between parties, enabling banks, businesses and financial institutions to improve cross-border payment services; while lowering their total cost of settlements, exchanges and transactions. The solution is specifically designed to meet the needs of regulation by fitting within existing risk, compliance and information security frameworks. Historically, trade has been limited to a congregation of local actors; with new technological advancements and a more globalized world, demand for global instant payments is growing rapidly. We want to make trade global with high security and without barriers. We accomplish this by automating currency conversions and bridging different financial systems.

We accelerate innovation for the future of food. We help entrepreneurs reach their full potential, providing our corporate partners with our expertise in open innovation and emerging technologies; assisting partner VCs with their portfolio startups; promoting the Sweden Foodtech scene at home and abroad through events and conferences. We open doors - locally and around the world. Our ambition is to build the next generation food-system based on tech, data, sustainability and health. Sweden Foodtech accelerates innovation for the future of food. As one of the main thought leaders in the Nordic foodtech ecosystem, our team focuses on innovation programs and business development opportunities, sharing specific competencies and diverse backgrounds.
Industries: Consumer Goods, Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software

About: Weway makes it easier for you as a couple to talk to you about what's important to you and then take action on it. Live up your relationship by identifying your values and talking together about how exactly you want to live together. The app that enables you to take your relationship to a new level by identifying your core values and live according to them.
Industries: Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software, Service

About: Equly.com is a new platform for monitoring and improving mental health. Physical health seems to be getting so much support but mental health is undermining our social fabric and devalues all of us. It is not just a psychological issue; it is a tremendous waste of the world’s human potential. By facilitating improved mental health, we empower lots of people a chance to live life at its fullest. Political, economic and social foundations rely on a sound support structure and will benefit all the world’s citizens. Together we can eradicate hardship and work towards a better world for everyone

NEW GENERATION OF WATER AWARENESS Labtrino is an IoT- and machine learning startup that meters and visualizes hot and cold water consumption in apartments - on an outlet level. Our smartphone application creates awareness of water consumption by comparing it among peers and offer individually tailored and smart nudges to eliminate unnecessary overconsumption. Non-invasive ultrasonic metering technology enables apartment metering for billing leak risk-free and cost-efficiently, instead of sharing the building’s total cost based on apartment size or number of residents. Labtrino AB develops an intelligent water meter system for residential property owners that enables sub-metering cost-efficiently. The company’s CubicMeter™ system uses machine learning to break down water usage data into outlets and diagnoses an entire homes water and hot water energy usage from a single, patented, non-invasive sensor. In our smartphone app, tenants then receive individually tailored nudges on how to efficiently lower usage, without sacrificing comfortability.

Take control of your asthma. AsthmaTuner is the only clinically validated self-care solution that directly gives you a treatment recommendation. By using our wireless spirometer you can measure your lung function and through our app you can also get an objective feedback on which medicine to take. Thanks to AsthmaTuner, your doctor can easily create a new treatment plan or use your existing one, giving you help with what is the best treatment for you at the right time. You can also track your asthma in the app over time to better analyze asthma's development. Not only that, you can follow your loved ones with the asthma app. As a parent, for example, you can manage your child's asthma directly through your own mobile phone. AsthmaTuner is created by Swedish researchers and doctors. The goal is to create our generation of asthma care, which improves the life of asthmatics and streamlines the work of healthcare professionals. With the help of AsthmaTuner, you can at any time test your asthma and get an individually tailored treatment recommendation, with whatever medication you need to feel the best. AsthmaTuner has been tested in clinical trials and has been shown to provide improved asthma control and that children can spend more days at school. We hope we can help you take control of your asthma!
Industries: Consumer Goods, Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software

About: Uniti is a automotive startup developing hich-tech electricity car, Uniti started as an open innovation project at Lund University and evolved into an independent startup in January 2016. The company aims at changing the automotive codes by redesigning the entire car, focusing on delivering a lightweight, digital first experience, as well as producing a completely climate-neutral car. Our goal is actually to get a million cars off the road in the next five years by switching people from combustion engines to affordable electric vehicles, by creating cost-saving models for shared mobility, and eventually, by saving some lives along the way through a greater use of vehicle autonomy.

Howdy provides your company with insight into both employee and organizational wellbeing, and takes proactive action when needed. Howdy is a digital tool, that promotes dialogue and opens the door towards valuable changes within the organization. Through a continous method Howdy paves the way towards better mental, physical and organizational wellbeing.
Industries: Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software, Service

About: We start from your heart data and coach you to better balance. Linkura is at the forefront of the disruptive movement for a democratic future health care where we address a global market using unique, scalable technology that enables people to improve their health and prevent disease. Linkura the worlds most prominent coaching platform. We empower individuals to improve their wellbeing by combining biodata with digital and human coaching. When unlocking information hidden deep in your heartbeats you will learn to identify, understand and balance your stress and recovery. The results are astonishing. Our users sleep better, balance stress/recovery better, increase their activity levels and most importantly; They feel better. Our platform is currently deployed in a multitude of organisations and insurance portfolios, increasing wellbeing at scale for thousands of users.
Industries: Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software, SaaS, Service

About: Hygglo is a peer-2-peer rental platform. Rent stuff you need from others and rent out your own stuff when they're not in use. Easy and secure! Stuff is meant to be used, so don't just let them sit there. Let them earn you some extra cash and help the environment at the same time. At Hygglo you will find everything from cars, boats, RV's to party tents, power tools and a lot more. Why own something when you can just rent it? Renting owns. Hygglo is a service for renting and renting out things between private individuals. Everything is insured, there is no cost to advertise and you keep 80% of the amount in the case of a rental . For those who rent, there are no costs or fees in addition to the rental price.

Sally R is a Swedish cleantech company developing novel climate control technology, which reduces energy consumption and enhances air quality in buildings. We're bringing down the climate control system from the International Space Station to earth to save energy in buildings and improve air quality. Our vision is that all people should breath good air. Because of this, we are developing smart ventilation and air treatment technology that improves air quality and decreases the energy consumption of commercial real estate buildings.

By offering artificial grip strength, Tendo creates greater independence for people suffering from disabilities, which results in an improved self-image and quality of life as well as a reduced need of assistance from the community and family. Tendo is worn almost like a glove and enables a strong grip in more or less all everyday situations. Tendo is developed with a great passion and curiosity for innovation, technology and keeps the user in mind with an understanding of how a disability can affect the self-image. Tendo is created for people, not symptoms.

Everyone leads a busy life nowadays. So, why not let us take care of your fitness and spiritual needs? mindfulHU focuses on healht tech innovation. We offer group classes and specialized programs to accommodate your busy schedule. The variety of personalized services, classes, workshops and tech devices helps our clients achieve healthier bodies and minds.

Plastic bags, milk cartons, take-away mugs - anything with a barcode can be ordered with the PantaPå app! You just scan the barcode on the packaging and get the pledge value - money or coupons - directly in your mobile. With the PantaPå app you can order at very ordinary recycling stations. You must be near a recycling station for the app to allow you to scan the barcode on the packaging you want to recycle. Find the nearest recycling station in the PantaPå app or register your own!
Industries: Consumer Goods, Energy & Greentech, IT & Software, Service

About: The New Global Standard in Body Composition Assessment. Now you can access multiple body composition biomarkers and disease insights through a rapid MRI. Get to know AMRA's solutions for your clinical and research needs. AMRA Medical is a ground-breaking, international digital health company at the forefront of medical imaging and precision medicine. The company has developed a new global standard in body composition assessment, delivering multiple fat and muscle biomarkers with unrivaled precision – all from a rapid whole-body MRI scan. AMRA was founded in 2010 in Linköping, Sweden, with the aim to support transformative care and vital decision-making, from clinical research to clinical care.

Gröna Grannar is a social entrepreneurship that aims to improve your life, the lives of others and the environment! We at Gröna Grannar want to accelerate the sustainable development that is required for our world. We are happy to help with small investments and lots of knowledge in everything that has to do with sustainable development.
Industries: Consumer Goods, Education, Media & Entertainment, Fintech

About: Jocce is an easy-to-use communication tool in the form of an app, which connects all the people around a person who for various reasons depend on everyday support. There may be relatives, friends and health and care professionals. Jocce can be used on the mobile phone and for the Recipient (the person in need of support) also on tablet. The person responsible for your Jocce network needs to download the Jocce app and then start the network. They can then invite the people to join the network.

Envisioning the future of cities.We believe that when transportation is fully optimized everything and everyone will be able to move freely, quickly and conveniently at a low cost to both the individual and the society. At Airmee we believe that logistics is synonymous with sustainability. We focus on that by expanding our fleet with carbon free vehicles and climate compensating, in addition to the optimization of the fleet with our technology. Airmee is a logistics technological platform with the vision of optimizing every transport in every city in the world. Our mission is to create the best and most environmentally sustainable delivery experience in the world by leveraging our research-based technology. We partner with online retailers and logistics providers to bring your purchases to you, at home, work, or anywhere—exactly when you need it.

Meet a dietician, on-line. Eatit helps you change your lifestyle and lose weight in 12 weeks - once and for all. With us you will find a dietitian online who specializes in weight loss and healthy habits . You have access to your legitimate dietician via chat at your convenience. As a user, you undergo Eatit's treatment plan, which is adapted to you as an individual and lasts for 8-12 weeks. The program is designed to help you achieve your health goals with eating habits that suit you and your everyday life.

Elevating learning with intelligent textbooks. Kognity is an award-winning digital publisher which combines the power of technology and textbooks to create a vastly elevated learning experience. The Kognity platform allows teachers to effortlessly support their students to reach new goals. Our interactive features have been designed with both the student and teacher in mind, allowing teachers to save time, whilst providing individually crafted pathways for each student. Let our technology do the overtime, so you can get back to your passion: teaching. Our content is 100% aligned with each curriculum and created by subject experts. We continuously update each one to the latest specifications meaning you and your students will always have access to the most relevant information for their course.

Worldfavor accelerates sustainability by offering a global platform for sharing corporate sustainability information. Worldfavor delivers a best practice SaaS platform for Sustainability reporting and management to users globally. We manage information security in accordance with ISO 27001. We connect organizations around the world to exchange sustainability information and excel in sustainability performance. Over 30 000 organizations have chosen to exchange sustainability data through Worldfavor, including supply chains over several continents. We help businesses avoid manual spreadsheets and cumbersome legacy software – simply because we want you to focus your time and resources on your impact strategy. Our vision is being the global information hub for sustainable decisions – building on the simplified exchange of sustainability information. Enabling all parties to exchange data in the same platform gives transparency and efficient sustainability reporting.

Eat out on a budget and protect the planet. Rescue unsold meals, always 50% off. Karma is the award-winning food app for buying delicious surplus food in London, Paris, and Sweden, at half the usual price. Simple and convenient, Karma highlights surplus food in your area to buy, collect and enjoy. Now with more than 1,600 restaurants, grocery stores, bakeries and cafes to rescue from, and more joining every week.
Industries: Consumer Goods, Energy & Greentech, IT & Software, Service

About: We are bridging the gap between sufferers and solutions. Simply Broken is a platform that connects the millions of mental health sufferers with the thousands of on the market mental health technology solutions using personalization, diagnostics, and transparency. 25% of the Danish population suffers from mental health disorders. That is 1.3 million people. They can be suffering from stress and anxiety to depression or addiction among others. The good news is there are more than 3000 applications on the market, not even including wearables and VR, that target supporting mental health. The bad news is that these sufferers lack the analytical capacity to filter and search to find a solution right for them and are presented by ad driven suggestions on today's search options. On top of that, only 28% of these have any medical validation or proof for their claims. Our personalization engine creates a shortlist of solutions tailored to what the person suffers from, the severity, and the ideal solution type that will keep them sticking to it long enough to see the benefit. Our listing is ad free so there is nothing to stop people from getting to the right solutions, fast and easily. We are building a solution in English and Danish and are targeting central and western Europe first, then planning to expand to the UK and Australia where some of the highest mental health disorder statistics are holding society back from thriving.

Hafnium Labs develop software that provides reliable physical property data for molecules and mixtures. Hafnium Labs supports chemicals, energy, and pharma companies by solving one of the biggest challenges in chemistry: Obtaining reliable physical properties fast. Researchers and engineers in chemicals, energy, and pharma use our tools to make faster and smarter design decisions. We have developed a breakthrough system for combining state-of-the-art predictive methods, such as quantum chemistry and AI, with experimental physical property data. Our Q-props™ tools support decision making from molecular discovery to process optimization.
Industries: Energy & Greentech, Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software, SaaS

About: Each year farmers use 30 billion kgs of pesticide costing 40 billion $. We think there's a smarter way. Fauna Smart Technologies is developing innovative tools for precise, fast and affordable pest management to significantly reduce (bio)pesticide usage, and improve the economic and environmental sustainability. As we evolve as a business we will be able to introduce more biocontrol solutions thus making agro-ecosystems regenerative and infinitely sustainable. Let's join forces and feed the world! Better food for better health.

We are working with determination to develop a sustainable solution for handling ballast water on board ships. Our solution meets current and upcoming legal requirements for treating ballast water, but at the same time has an environmental benefit as it also removes plastic pollution from the world seas. With our solution, shipping will not only serve as a traditional means of transportation but also have a secondary function as a sailing purification unit - contributing positively to the global maritime strategy of protecting and utilizing resources from the world seas. MicroChange aims to filter microplastics and marine biomass from ballast water which limits plastic pollution and makes sustainable energy production possible. Our goal is to enable recycle of marine biomass as an energy source directly accessible as fuel on board ships while minimizing plastic pollution in the oceans. The solution will not only bring value within the maritime industry, but also for companies using a large volume of seawater in their daily production. We are all passionate about contributing to the development of a new technological solution that takes environmental factors, sustainability and utilization of the nature's resources into consideration.

Secondtots is a concept that takes care of the used children's clothing from a-å. Secondtots is, in short, a platform that helps to sell children's clothing. We have put the whole process in system so that it is clear for both the buyer and the seller, and that is how we stand out from other platforms that sell used children's clothing. You simply avoid a lot of hassle! Both as a buyer and seller of used children's clothing, you help to make an effort for the environment while saving money yourself.

IBG ProReact is a Danish software company specializing in social IT. IBG is a digital life management tool for citizens with disabilities, their carers and relatives - in one unified solution. With IBG, citizens and employees in the social care sector control everyday communication and planning so that citizens' lives become safe and predictable and their self-reliance and community are strengthened. Through the IBG app and large interactive screens, citizens, employees and relatives always have access to all the information relevant to the individual citizen. In IBG, citizens can get all the information of the day - food plan, activities, news and much more, and they can also add information themselves - for example. sign up for activities, upload movies and book resources.
Industries: Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software, SaaS

About: One of humanity’s biggest challenges is to produce enough quality food for a rapidly growing population in a sustainable way. And scaling up conventional farming is simply not a viable option. Growstack paves the way for new solutions by making vertical farming technology accessible, bringing motivated people together and removing the barriers to get started with new ways of producing food. Vertical farming is a promising alternative. That’s because it is extremely resource-efficient with full control of an automated plant production. It enables local production of high-quality food with no pesticides. An aeroponic vertical farming technology stack is made openly available, while knowledge sharing is supported and a culture of really walking the talk is built in the community. We will make the production of delicious, tasty, highly nutritious and pesticide-free local food possible for everyone, everywhere.

Join the Future of Real Estate. We help accelerate & nurture innovation, technological development & digital transformation in Real Estate. Frame is at one time a method for process management of sustainable construction and a tool for sustainable design. Frame is a digital platform that makes it possible to work qualitatively and simply with sustainability criteria from idea to operation. Instead of waiting to measure and assess the sustainability of the building, the knowledge and criteria for sustainability could be integrated from the beginning of the construction process and create more sustainable value for money. Frame is based on the integration of sustainability into the industry's known phase model, so that sustainability becomes concrete, clear and accessible to all the actors involved in all phases from idea to operation.

aio is your personal guide to better health and well-being. About: At Rodinia, we believe that innovative technology is the key to drive sustainable growth, economically as well as environmentally. Rodinia wants to not only tackle social and climate change challenges, but more importantly help the fashion industry to realize the vast potential of doing so. By making a stronger case for climate and social responsibilities as drivers for economic benefits, the industry can unlock the much greater speed and scale of action that is required to sustain a healthy planet and a healthy business without compromising the other. The technology allows for the same costs whether the production batch consists of 300 identical or unique designs. Sustainability, a strong drive, and a visionary mindset are the fundamental values connecting all Rodinia’s enthusiasts that work towards a common goal: to change the way we make fashion.

Rocket57 is startup accelerator for Marin Biotech and IT startups. About: We are creating a new way for organisations to start implementing sustainability by making sure that everyone is included and empowered in the transformation. Incept Sustainability is an online learning and analytics site with simple and easy guides introducing topics within the field of sustainability. These guides are designed to be shared and taken by an entire organisation ensuring that everyone are included in the discussion. All our learning material are interactive and focus on the work of the individual employee, we can therefore use it to collect insights, feedback and ideas from all corners of the organisation. We use this to create a roadmap with concrete action that can an organisation further. To make our material we use high level sources, academic confirmation and heavy user testing to ensure that the guides communicates the topic as well as possible. It has been clear for a while now that sustainable growth this is not a job for few the but for the many - yet programmes often only include and teach a few. That's where Incept Sustainability steps in.

Octarine harnesses synthetic biology to develop functionally superior cannabinoid and psilocybin derivatives. Our mission is to improve the health and well-being of people worldwide. Using our unique biosynthetic platform we engineer microorganisms to produce a range of natural and novel cannabinoid and psilocybin derived molecules with improved pharmacokinetic and therapeutic properties. We make super molecules! Improving on what nature already offers in ways that aren’t feasible with traditional organic chemistry. We have developed proprietary enzyme platform technologies to efficiently modify molecules, and fermentation platforms to effectively scale-up production. Want to know more?
Industries: Consumer Goods, Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software

About: We are making nuclear an inexpensive, sustainable and safe technology that can out-compete fossil fuels and revolutionise energy markets. Seaborg is developing a nuclear reactor technology fundamentally different from what exists today. Compact Molten Salt Reactor, the CMSR, is safe, significantly smaller and new type of nuclear reactor which is better for the environment, and inexpensive even compared to fossil fuels. In the CMSR, fuel is mixed in a liquid salt that acts as coolant. This ensures it can always be cooled and it cannot melt down or explode. It will simply shut down by itself in case of an emergency. Seaborg is rethinking nuclear ad making it sustainable. Above all, Seaborg is working to provide abundant, affordable and sustainable energy available to all.

MYiNNERME is digital family therapy. An app that helps children and young people (age 8-16 years) to cope with difficult emotions - with the support of their parents. - Gitte, mother to eleven-year-old Rasmus: "I think it was a really great tool for helping us to get talking about some of our emotions... It is major issues to discuss and the app provided us with a mutual language we could use." ** THE BEST FAMILY THERAPY APP ** Dealing with a child who is struggling all on your own can seem hopeless, and finding help can seem even more impossible. But help is within your reach, and MYINNERME is a good place to start. MYINNERME is digital therapy for children and young people who are ready to face those difficult emotions head-on in order to feel better about themselves. Additionally, the app is for parents who want to support their children and help them cope with their challenges. Because when children and young people are struggling they need help from their family in order to face those difficult emotions. The courses in the app are aimed at children and young people between the age of 8-16 years, and as a parent your login will give you guidance in how to help your child cope with their struggles, meanwhile the child will in their app work through a playful and research-based course on topics such as: • Anger • Bullying • Grief • Shyness (social anxiety) When parent and child download the app, you can in cooperation make the child thrive again. The app is perfect for people with a child that don’t need therapy but they require help and advice on how to deal with their child's problems. For people who prefer the 100% flexible and confidential help you get through the app. And it’s ideal for people who have been on a waiting list for a consultation with a Child and Adolescent Therapist for far too long. The app, which is developed by a child psychologist with 10 years of experience, can also be used as a supplement to an ongoing treatment. ** SAY HI TO US ** We would like to hear about your MYiNNERME experience. Don't hesitate to contact us on our social media if you have any feedback or questions: • Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/myinnermeapp/ • Instagram - @myinnermeapp .. or send us an email at hello@myinnerme.com
Industries: Education, Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software

About: Say goodbye to expensive storage rooms or make money in unused space. Are you missing a place to store your stuff? Let HAMSTO help find the right solution for you and your needs. Together we can take advantage of the space we already have. Hamsto is a Danish-owned company that provides contact and security between the landlord and tenant of storage and parking. As a tenant, you save money compared to expensive storage at established warehouses, and as a landlord, you can earn an extra penny in the space you do not use anyway. HAMSTO provides storage between private clients and landlords. Storage at HAMSTO is flexible as the user and landlord jointly agree on the time horizon, price and availability framework. Book, order, pay and make an appointment with your new landlord who will safely look after your belongings.

Pendlr – everyday ridesharing made easy. Reducing the endless stream of single-occupant vehicles with ride-sharing requires little effort and change. About: Trebo is a cleantech startup developing a scalable and cost-effective technology for plastic sorting. Trebo allows the plastic industry to reduce its carbon footprint by enabling access to sorted recyclable materials! The award winning technology is able to separate mixtures of different plastic types with a separation quality of +98%. The technology is developed at the Technical University of Denmark and the two founders Andreas Leth Bockhoff and Thomas Trebbien are striving to provide the plastic industry with better sorting options.

LuxC is developing an Augmented Reality solution for professional transport fleets and emergency services to enhance road safety by delivering mission critical information directly within the field of view of the driver and providing Night Vision. The fully connected, 5G-ready, infrared sensor technology allows for real-time interfacing between driver and HQ without compromising road safety. Their product improve the situational awareness of the driver by delivering mission critical information directly to the eyes of the driver. LuxC was founded with a mission to save lives by advancing Augmented Reality solutions for the professional automotive fleets.
Unitio is a modern and intuitive intranet software that connects and engages employees to drive productivity and efficiency through personalized, social, and timely content.

Pelechecoco is a sustainable fashion brand that sources vintage leather from around the world, chop up the vintage pieces and then carefully match the leather together to create a brand new leather jacket crafted responsibly by using sustainable materials. Pelechecoco produces sustainable leather jackets with the aim to save +30.000 litre of water per jacket. That's over 40 years of drinking water per person. All leather jackets are made from post-consumer waste, turning otherwise discarded clothing into new beautiful looking pieces. Pelechecoco makes their products a far more sustainable alternative to the average newly produced leather jacket. Pelechecoco is not about reinventing fashion, rather about reinventing the way we think about fashion, educating the consumer on the resources we can reuse rebooting iconic styles, updating them slightly to fit with the times, we want to move in a greener direction.

Go Impact is a task platform that connects voluneers and NGOs to solve minor tasks within the UN's goal of sustainable development. The platform connects volunteers to environmental and social responsibility taskas while offering NGOs cheap marketing and CSR. The tasks are solved voluntarily by volunteers based on their interests, skills and demographics. With Go Impact platfor, it is inexpensive and efficient to solve minor tasks within the UN's Sustainable Development Goals (SDG), focusing on environmental and social responsibility.

MINLANDSBY is a digital community for villages throughout Denmark. Minlandsby offers a Village App for locals and tourists to navigate the village's activities quickly and easily. My Village is a company that focuses on, how the villages can be preserved and expeienced by both visitors and locals.

Discover and share short-term showroom spots - Discover a spot for your next pop-up or share your space to tell new stories. Low-Temperature Heat Recovery. In FluidTech, we are working towards the goal of recovering low-temperature heat. Furthermore, we provide the technology to efficiently use heat and transform it into high grade electricity in the process. FluidTech was born with the vision to provide sustainable power generation from waste energy sources. During the past year, we have developed this vision and transform it into reality. Despite all the research during the past years, only a few solutions implemented in real scenarios; which they have proved the feasibility and reliability of such solutions. FluidTech aims to change the current scenario of low-grade waste heat, to provide also products for low power output for certain industries and households connected to a local district heating network.

2ND EDIT, the most stylish Nordic marketplace for pre-owned luxury and designer fashion. Buy, sell, share! 2ND EDIT was launched in 2015 by a team of 3 founders who recognized the need for an online platform that allowed people to buy and sell luxury pre-owned fashion. 2ND EDIT creates a unique environment where all items are authenticated and checked before reaching the buyer, thereby eradicating the risks of purchasing counterfeits, mis-selling or mis-pricing items.

Resecond is your joined dress closet. A shared walk-in closet where you give the nice dresses that you no longer use to others. About: Intelligent Monitoring of Pigs. Automate your manual monitoring of farrowing sows, giving one extra surviving piglet per litter and better animal welfare. We are an AI-Tech company based in Odense, and we believe in the power of data. Our vision is to enable farmers to take advantage of the enormous amount of data in the pig stables, to support and improve production management and animal welfare. PorcoVision enables farmers to save million of piglets by using AI in pig productions. Our product improves animal welfare, increases the revenue for the farmers, and lowers the carbon footprint of the meat production.

We have started Planet Happy as part of our own personal journey to become more conscious consumers in a world that screams for both growth and green change. We believe that it is possible for Denmark not only to live up to the goals set in the Paris Agreement, but also to make it even better. But that doesn't happen by itself. If we are to avoid climate scientists' worst nightmares, we will have to radically change the way we think and act and rethink the structures we have in our society. Change is a prerequisite for future generations to have a place on the globe - and as always with change, someone has to lead the way. In such a privileged society as Denmark (although we are certainly not flawless), we believe that it is our responsibility to take the lead. Our responsibility - the Danish politicians, the Danish companies, the Danish civil society, and not least all of us ordinary people who collectively can make a difference.
The team behind ObTek has discovered that almost no one washes their hands well enough. That is why we have developed Ob-1, a product there automatically improves the quality of washing hands.

Obital has developed the world's most affordable and accessbile eye-tracking software. No complicated calibration or external hardware required. Running on any regular smartphone. Create your own eye tracking enabled apps. Obital SDK allow developers to create apps utilizing eye tracking data or interaction with just a few lines of code. Works with your everyday devices. No calibration needed. No additional hardware required. Analyze user behavior through their eye movements. Generate heatmaps and gaze plots to follow their attention and stream of thoughts. Identify regions of special interest to the user and visualize your findings to improve decision making. Easily add advanced eye control into any application. Ensure great user experience while maintaining robustness and effect for the user. We make sure user interaction is consistent across devices and platforms.
Industries: Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software, SaaS

About: Making the world’s waste collection greener, cleaner and smarter. Reduce collection costs and emissions by 50% and eliminate overflowing waste. Nordsense has created a complete end-to-end waste management solution. We optimize the trash collection process by monitoring container levels, applying advanced data analytics, and delivering need based turn-by-turn directions to a driver. Nordsense offers a unique, easy to use, efficient, cost-effective and scalable smart waste solution for cities, waste operators, and trash haulers. The Nordsense solution provides a positive environmental impact by reducing both the number of vehicles on the road and fuel consumption, as well as preventing unattractive and unsanitary overflowing bins.

Actionable farm fertility levels within minutes. Improve yield, save cost and avoid environmental contamination from fertilisers with our rapid nanosensor. We enable true data-driven and adaptive farm practices. With Nordetect, farm managers and agricultural service providers can remove risk and use valid data that is easy to understand and implement to ensure impressive harvests. With near-realtime analysis, ease-of-use and a cost-reduction of around 70%, the barriers for continuous use of nutrient data in farm management are gone. We have developed a proprietary technology, that does chemistry-based target molecule quantification in record time. The versatile nature of our product suite allows us to help not only the agricultural and environmental industry, but also companies in other domains in need of rapid nano-sensing.

Building the cities of the future. MONTEM develop intelligent infrastructure for different sectors on municipality and national levels. The pay-as-you-go solar energy system for families in the developing world. M-PAYG is a provider of high-quality prepaid solar energy systems for the developing world. Our systems allow off-grid low-income households and businesses to access solar energy through small-scale mobile repayments. To use the system you unlock it through weekly or monthly mobile repayments. Our mission is to offer the best tailored energy solutions to people without.

Cold Pasteurization Solutions. Setting new standards for energy efficiency, sustainability and product quality with UV-light pasteurization. Improving lives through digital health coaching. Scalable and personal health programmes for lifestyle and chronic disease management. About: IoT Infrastructure is focused around creating solutions, that will extend lifetime of existing infrastructures such as buildings, offices, hotels and homes. IoT Consult is a process and business oriented consultancy looking at the longer impact of Internet of Things, we focus on delivering end-user value and sustainable business models for our clients, by minimizing the global environmental impact from internet of Things. At Intempus, we love hour registration! As engineers and designers, we have always been frustrated about wasting time on tasks that could have been performed smarter. It became clear that laboratory professionals shared our frustration. They spend most of their time in the laboratory performing manual and repetitive work. That is why we build a tool, that enables laboratory professionals to automate the tedious work of designing, executing and documenting their experiments. We believe tomorrow’s innovation was needed yesterday. That’s why Inniti have empowered visionary lab professionals with the first connected lab solution that generates unique insights. That is why visionary scientists need visionary equipment.

Help it Home works to make it easier for you to help your fellow people! Help it Home is a community-based platform for recovering lost property. Easy, secure and anonymous. By using our keychains and stickers that you can put on your belongings, we have enabled you to recover your lost belongings. Each tag has a unique ID and associated QR code, so whoever finds your lost property can easily help. In a world of fear and insecurity, we want to put humanity on the agenda. We believe that Denmark is full of people who actually want to help each other - especially if it is not too difficult. ☺ Help it Home is to promote the belief that charity exists in Denmark. We dream that through Help it Home experiences, people become aware that we don't have to be afraid of each other, but instead are surrounded by people who want to help.

We help individuals, organizations and the healthcare sector utilize good habits as a catalyst for change. Would you like to change the physiotherapy? We will. And that is why we are currently working on a new digital tool that, through involvement, motivation, data and your analysis, will make the dialogue and treatment between patient and therapist much better. At Habitlab, we firmly believe that we can make a difference by getting specialists to work together across professional boundaries toward a common goal.

Our mission is to help people share cars. We're doing this with our platform that combines ridesharing, peer-to-peer rental, and private leasing. With ridesharing people share their journeys with others that are travelling in the same direction, helping cover travel costs, reducing the number of vehicles on the roads and meeting new people in the process. With peer-to-peer car rentals, car owners can share their car when not being used, and people without cars get easier access to one nearby. Fewer people need to own cars if we share the ones we already have. With leasing, you can get your own car and rent out it when not using it. Leasing with GoMore is easier than owning a car and renting it out can help keep the costs down. The larger our community grows, the more we can share with each other. Every day we're working to get as many people as possible to share their cars. We have millions of users, but we’re just getting started.

At FOCUSWRX, we help people invest their energy right to promote longterm performance and well-being. We customise programs for individuals and teams, combining our digital platform FOCUSWRX with coaching for individuals and facilitated training and e-learning. FOCUSWRX helps organisations invest time and energy on what matters most making it possible to achieve top priorities in a sustainable way. We provide a system for working with energy, priorities, time and attention that promotes sustainable high-performance and well-being. We are a technology and advisory company combining measurements from wearables with the behavioural change to help employees and teams to perform and thrive in today’s working environment.

We are on a mission to help companies innovate and recharge their existing products with AI and Machine Learning. More to the point we believe that the consequences of us becoming more and more able to solve problems using AI we also need to make sure that we are acting responsibly.

We are a Nordic company specialised in exponential technology and responsible disruption. For us, disruption is a strategy applied to create new solutions for new needs that shape new markets and transform value systems in society. We advocate technological intuition to impact directions of change. We design tools that enable creative and purposeful collaborations. We help organisations understand and utilise the potentials of exponential technologies and disruptive innovation. We live in a world in which today’s best practice risk becoming obsolete tomorrow. We understand that change can be difficult, but when necessary we have made it our mission to engage closely with customers, organisations, and society to make a real and lasting impact. Limited by our imagination of the problems to be solved, by innovations yet to come, we promote open minded innovation and disruption in collaboration. We see it as our role to facilitate change and creative crossings of mind, technologies, and businesses. It is by making the future exciting, by curating new dialogues and daring you to change and disrupt that we believe we can exponentially accelerate problem-solving in the world. As long as there are problems in the world, we make it our mission to empower the curious and the disruptors.

Our indoor environment is invisible, though surrounds us all the time. It affects our well-being, our health, and sometimes even our life expectancy. It feels unpleasant if we feel too cold, or too hot. If the room is too dry, or too humid. If the air is bad, or the surroundings too noisy. If it is too dark, for what we are about to do. Or too bright. CLIMAID Insight processes data from your indoor climate and turns them into health, well-being, and a good economy in only 3 steps. Collect With our CLIMAID Insight app, we collect employees’ perceptions of their indoor climate. With IoT indoor climate sensors we collect quantitative knowledge on the indoor climate. Compare Data undergoes comprehensive analysis to find trends not visible in manual analysis. Qualitative data as the employees' perceptions are translated to quantitative data and compared to the measurements. Connect With the CLIMAID Insight app employees and management are connected to their indoor climate. Users are nudged with real-time recommendations on the app along with the opportunity to feedback their perception of the indoor climate. Management connects with the indoor climate through the company dashboard.
Industries: Energy & Greentech, IT & Software, SaaS, IoT

About: Circle Devices develops a next generation contraceptive product. We aim to create natural, desirable and safe alternative to existing contraceptive products. Our goal is to uphold the radical ideals that fueled the initial birth control movement. No longer should we accept the side effects that have become normalized by hormonal birth control. Nor the inconvenience of existing alternatives. OUI is embracing innovation to expand freedom for women. In this pursuit, we should not settle for anything less than revolutionary. OUI is a vaginal capsule that after insertion rapidly dissolves and releases the formulation. It is targeted to provide effective birth control a minute after insertion and for up to 1 day without the use of any hormones. OUI makes cervical mucus temporarily impenetrable to sperm. The barrier is established by a molecule that strongly interacts with cervical mucus and thereby reinforce the mucus to make it impenetrable for sperm cells. Sperm cells are trapped in the cervical mucus and maintained in the vaginal cavity where the low pH environment of the vagina deactivates them.

Optimize your finances with one app. Why pay high fees and interest when you don't have to? Capuchin.one is a virtual bank assistant who helps keep your accounts in plus and bring down the bad interest rates and fees. Capuchin is going to be launched soon.

The digital solution for a blood sufficient world. Blood sufficiency is not solely about increasing donations. It is also about using donated blood in the most effective way. Bloodlink streamlines the sourcing and exchange of blood by connecting all stakeholders on one online platform. BloodLink believes everybody should have access to safe and secure blood. We also believe that technology can be used to benefit the greater good. Therefore, BloodLink provides a vital piece of the puzzle that is missing in the blood acquisition landscape: effective connections. We wish to take the responsibility of finding blood out of the hands of the patient by connecting blood banks and hospitals in a more efficient way than ever before. This platform will utilise AI and machine learning so blood banks and hospitals can exchange blood with ease and trust. Eventually we also wish to include blood donation camps and donors, so that shortage in all areas becomes a thing of the past.
Industries: Healthcare & Life Science, IT & Software, Service

About: Power-up and simplify your sustainable development - with a light CSR 2.0 platform for smart sustainablility management, hassle-free impact reporting and collaborative supply chain intelligence. Automatic and continued sharing of your sustainability data to selected customers and other stakeholders. Avoid the heavy-lifting involved with the multiple and repeated cycles of receiving a request for information, adapting your data to the request and preparing a unique response. Practice transparency to build trust-based relationships with your customers. Easily meet different customer requirements for sustainability reporting. Adopt the Know Do Share Code and earn the Green Belt to demonstrate your commitment. Sustainability without tears.
Industries: Energy & Greentech, Fintech, IT & Software, SaaS

About: Buildcode is an entrepreneurial engineering company specialized in developing systems for optimizing quality assurance in the construction industry. Our solution SiteMotionis based on day-to-day registrations done with drone and scanning technologies for recording and processing the data related to building informatics that enable to: - minimize errors and deficiencies on the construction site - improve communication during the construction process - enhance the overall quality of the building We work hard to learn and achieve and we face every problem with a solution.
Industries: Energy & Greentech, IT & Software, Service, Science & Engineering

About: Able is changing the way people lose weight using gamification to drive motivation and long-lasting results. It’s fun, playful and engaging! Oh, and very effective too. Able feels like a game and makes sure you stay motivated throughout your weight loss. You’ll receive daily coins, build up your streak, collect achievements and earn gems to spend on fun virtual goods. Able is an effective way to keep your eyes on the big goal. It’s like nothing you have ever tried before. Based on a few facts about you, your body and your goal, Able is built on a simple and user friendly concept: You’ll receive a batch of coins every day and spend them on foods throughout the day. You can do some exercises and earn extra coins. If you got any coins left at the end of the day, they’ll be saved in your weekly treasure chest for you to spend on another day.
Industries: Consumer Goods, Healthcare & Life Science, SaaS

About: Nature Preserve (www.naturepreserve.co) is a foodtech company that re-engineers avoidable food surplus into a range of healthy ingredients and products, including LOVI (www.lovismoothies.com), a smoothie brand made from 100% natural and upcycled ingredients. Fighting food waste never tasted better.

The Pitch We are bringing charging into the era of the sharing economy with an ecosystem of connected stations where users can rent power banks with cables, charge on the go, and then return at any chosen station. The What Consumption is increasingly unsustainable, and this is particularly true for consumer electronics. We all own dozens of chargers, for example, that we bought anytime our phones were running low on battery and we urgently needed them. Production today is focused on producing cheap electronics that we simply buy, use and discard. Today´s cities are built around the paradigm of mass consumption and the modern consumer owns a constantly increasing stockpile of discardable electronics. This has made plastics and electronics waste generation a growing concern all across the globe at the same time as the world´s resources are strained ever so intensely. It is therefore paramount that consumption patterns change towards sharing as opposed to owning, and towards upcycling as opposed to discarding. The How Our startup is tackling the issue of discardable electronics in the area where it arguably affects consumers daily life the most; phone charging. We bring charging into the era of the sharing economy by offering rented power banks with charging cables for all devices all around your city. With an easy scan of a QR code on the stations, users get a fully charged power bank that they can bring with them and keep for up to 5 days. When the user is ready, the rental can be ended by just inserting the power bank into any chosen station, that automatically locks the power bank and ends the rental in the users app. It is important for us to keep prices low enough to actually change charging behavior, and show the benefits of sharing over owning. By bringing charging into the era of the sharing economy we create a circular market for electronics, and maximize their utilization through sharing within the community. We see this as a modern solution to a modern problem. The Why We are inspired by creating solutions that not only make peoples´ lives easier, but also have a positive impact on the community. Our belief is that a true sustainability isn´t achieved by sacrificing consumers´ convenience, but on the contrary through innovative solutions that make smarter use of available resources. Through a global outlook one can identify these proven innovations and import them to new markets. When we first saw the popularity of sharable power banks in Asia, we knew this was a transformative idea that had to be brought to the rest of the world. Ever since then, we have worked relentlessly on developing our own take on the concept for the European market.

The Pitch Greenlytics is a weather analytics company targeting the power and utility industry deal with weather intermittency through Analytics-as-a-Service The What Renewable energy is needed to help decarbonise the power, heat and transportation industry. With increasing amount of renewables integrated into the grid, the power system is becoming more weather dependent. Adding to this the advent of climate change with more and more adverse weather effects. Understanding complex patterns of weather impact and making operational decisions is essential for sustainability, profitability and reliability of tomorrows energy system. The How Greenlytics provides the Greenlytics Platform, which is a data and analytics platform to develop weather analytics applications. The Greenlytics Platform allows users to develop their own AI solutions in 80% less time - going all the way from idea to operational decision-support system in just matters of days instead of weeks or months. The Why Being form the energy industry, we saw problems from the inside of big utility companies. Difficulty in adoption and operationalisation of AI due to constraints on data, IT systems, scalability etc. We wanted to change this by providing the tools we which we had ourselves. In addition, a strong motivator for us is the potential positive impact on the world that Greenlytics will have!

The Pitch Connect the app to your bank and receive a customized analysis on your carbon footprint in the form of a forest. Offset your individualized calculated carbon emissions by planting trees in the app. The What Based on our research, people would like to better understand their environmental impact. However, the current solutions are considered to be very time-consuming and tedious. Questions such as average meat consumption and kilometers traveled by car are difficult to estimate. But even if people manage to calculate their carbon footprint, we realized that they have trouble interpreting the result, as this is often an abstract number in kilograms of CO2. Hence, we identified an opportunity to help people understand their environmental impact visually, to encourage them to take action against climate change and deforestation. The How We believe our solution is a unique approach, as it is based on automation and convenience. In the first step, the user links the app to his bank account from our banking partners in the Nordics. In the app, you can see your own virtual forest. Whenever you spend money, the carbon footprint of this transaction is calculated instantly and results in trees being cut down. There are two ways to compensate for your impact: you can adapt your consumer behaviour to help the forest recover. Or you can plant new trees that not only appear in your virtual forest but are planted in the real world.. The Why We want to involve more people in the fight against the very serious problem of climate change. We aim that people make a difference by planting trees to compensate for their carbon footprint. The idea Breathe was born amongst three friends in the Interaction Design Programme at CIID in 2019.
